page.title: 18Transport in the area
page.content: We did a survey for 30 minutes of the cars on the road by the sewage plant. The survey was to find out what the most common types of cars and manufacturers of cars were.The"top seven"types of cars are as follows:- (1)Ford Cortina 32(2)Ford Escort 28 (3)Austin Metro 14(4=)Vauxhall Cavalier&Austin Mini 10(6)Morris Marina 9(7)Rover 7 Of these the Ford Cortina and Morris Marina are not in production any more, the top "top ten" manufactures in order of popularity are:- (21)Ford 82(2)Austin Rover 60 (3)Vauxhall Opel 32 (4)peugeot Talbot 18 (5=)CItroen&Volvo 12 (7)Renault 10 (8)Nissan/Datsun 7 (9)Volkswagen 6 (10)Toyota 4
